data.title: Examples of "Maseru" in a Sentence
data.meta_description: Learn how to use "maseru" in a sentence with 6 example sentences on YourDictionary.
data.text: We live in a big, wide world. With seven continents in total, there are 195 countries in the world. Of those, 193 are officially recognized by the United Nations, an organization that was established after WWII to maintain international peace. The remaining two are non-members known as observer states: Holy See and Palestine. These entities are invited to observe in various activities with limited participation.
